name: Clickart
description:
A unique and atmospheric clicker in which you use clicks and upgrades to destroy monsters and level up, achieving new worlds and setting new records.

Click Art is a clicker with a side view, where the player clicks monsters, buys improvements, pumping up monster destruction as well as click damage levels, progressing through new levels and discovering new worlds and types of monsters.

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Clicker
- Difficulty
